data.title: CBC Montreal loves YA!
data.meta_description: MTL YA FEST! — Montreal's only young adult author festival — takes place May 26.
data.text:
Montreal's only young adult author festival takes place on May 26, and CBC will be there.

The goal of MTL YA FEST! is to connect teens with their favourite authors through panel talks, discussions, book signings, music and games. Some 25 YA authors from all over North America will be there, including Sarah Mlynowski, Kristen Ciccarelli, Tim Wynne-Jones, Monique Polak and Cherie Dimaline.

Nantali Indongo, host of CBC Montreal's The Bridge, will emcee the event, as well as moderate the Turtle Island Reads Indigenous Voices panel.

In brief:

What: MTL YA FEST! — Montreal's 2nd annual young adult book festival

When: Sunday, May 26, 2019 from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.

Where: Jewish Public Library (5151 Côte-Ste-Catherine, Montreal)

Cost: $20.00

Lunch and refreshments will be provided.
